item.description: Celebrate Halloween 2011 at one of Boston's hottest clubs and mingle with celebrity hosts and drunk Bostonians while enjoying our signature drinks while you witness costumed insanity. Spooky Spooky! Trick O Treat this Friday at Caprice Boston on 275 Tremont Street, Boston MA. Doors at 10pm. Party till 2am. Get there early this is going to be one of the craziest weekends of the year. Get your costumes ready. 2 Floors/ 3 Rooms with different music in each room. Floor 1: Top 40/ Hip Hop/ Mashups/ Reggaeton Floor 2: International/ House. 21+ Event For Questions email: Highrollerboston@gmail.com or call / txt 617-416-8705 Don't wait to buy your tickets. While other clubs charge $25-$30 we only charge $10 so buy your tickers in advance and join the Insanity.. Buy your tickets online for Guaranteed Entry & no waiting in line before 11:30 PM by buying tickets at http://highrollerbost...
item.name: Desi Saint & Sinners Halloween costume party
